hero.name: Felton Babu
hero.description: I'm a passionate Software Engineer hailing from Nairobi, Kenya, specializing in Java (Spring), Php (Codeigniter|Laravel), and RPA (Power Automate|UIPATH) with a keen interest in DevSecOps. Exploring new horizons and continuous learning are my driving forces. With a rich portfolio showcasing a myriad of projects, you're invited to delve into the details in the dedicated portfolio section of this website. I am eagerly anticipating exciting opportunities and challenges ahead. Let's embark on this journey together!

about.title: UNLEASHING INNOVATION THROUGH SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT
about.description: Greetings! I'm Felton, a passionate full-stack developer with over 8 years of experience in crafting remarkable web and app solutions. My journey involves delving deep into the realms of Java, JavaScript, Python, PHP, and Kotlin. Proficient in frameworks like Spring Boot, ReactJS, Angular, and Node.js, I strive to create impactful solutions that resonate in the world of software development.

allService.title: Application Development
allService.subTitle: I specialize in developing innovative and efficient applications tailored to meet your specific needs.

allService.title: Website Design
allService.subTitle: Crafting visually appealing and user-friendly websites that leave a lasting impression.

allService.title: Mobile App Development
allService.subTitle: Creating seamless and responsive mobile applications to enhance user experiences.

allService.title: Graphic Design
allService.subTitle: Bringing creativity to life through visually stunning graphic designs for various purposes.

allTestimonial.reviewText: Felton's attention to detail and commitment to quality were instrumental in our project's success. His ability to code efficiently and troubleshoot issues made a significant impact. It was a great experience working alongside him

Felton is a highly skilled and experienced software developer. He is always willing to go the extra mile to get the job done and is always looking for ways to improve our systems. Felton is also a great team player and is always willing to help others. I highly recommend Felton for any software development position.

Working with Felton is a pleasure. His technical knowledge and collaborative approach made our projects run smoothly. He's a team player, always ready to share insights and support team members. I look forward to future collaborations with him.

Felton delivered a solution that exceeded our expectations. His ability to understand our needs and translate them into a user-friendly application was impressive. We're grateful for his dedication to our project's success.

sectionHeading.subTitle: Always available for freelancing if the right project comes along. I prioritize deep work for optimal productivity, so please understand potential delays in responses. Your patience is appreciated.
